name: The Big Red Button (Waxeye Games)
description:
Its my first attempt at a phone game so its not the most advanced game in the world.

it is a very basic clicker type game except you are limited in when you can click by a decreasing ever meter. the meter replenishes over time.

there are upgrades to buy in order to increase button productivity.

I found that it can be quite addictive despite being so simple.
